nodes.text: Auric Graf was a male human married to Rhyssa Graf, and together- for the past 15 years they had worked as cartographers in Wild Space, producing maps of the vast area, during the Age of the Empire. Auric and Rhyssa had two children, Lina and Milo, and the children accompanied their parents on expeditions. While on an uncharted swampworld, Captain Visler Korda of the Galactic Empire arrested Auric and his wife, leaving Lina and Milo behind.
